original_text: And unto Joseph were born two sons before the years of famine came, which Asenath the daughter of Potipherah priest of On bare unto him.
korean_text: 흉년이 들기 전에 요셉에게 두 아들이 나되 곧 온의 제사장 보디베라의 딸 아스낫이 그에게서 낳은지라

sentences.original_text: And unto Joseph were born two sons
before the years of famine came
which Asenath the daughter of Potipherah
priest of On bare unto him
